example.name: proxy voting
example.text: ``Thank God we have some deal on the table,'' said Stewart Gilchrist, a director at Scottish Amicable Investment Managers, which intends to vote its roughly 1% stake in favor of the restructuring.

roleset.note: Two points about the last example: Scottish Amicable is not doing the voting, really, but rather the shares (cf the previous example). Thus Scottish Amicable takes the causal agent role. Also, "in favor of" is basically the same as "for".
